description: The unreliable hot mom happily rushed to join her lover abroad, leaving no money behind. Shu Yuan, the 16 year old high school freshman, has to rent some rooms of his house to make a living. A cute Loli, a sexy lady, a nasty dog, and all kinds of people and creatures walk into Shu Yuan’s life, making his days dramatic both at home and on campus.>
